name: grip-claw
effect: Held: Increases the duration of the holder’s multiturn (2-5 turn) moves by three turns.
short_effect: Held: Holder’s multi-turn trapping moves last 5 turns.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of multi-turn attacks like Bind and Wrap.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of multi-turn attacks like Bind and Wrap.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It extends the duration of multi-turn attacks, such as Bind and Wrap.
